00011 #include "NvtIntegrator.h"

00014 #include <ddMd/storage/AtomStorage.h>

00020 #include <util/global.h>

00024 namespace DdMd
00025 {
00026    using namespace Util;

00028    /* 
00029    * Constructor.
00030    */
00031    NvtIntegrator::NvtIntegrator(Simulation& simulation)
00032     : Integrator(simulation),
00033       prefactors_(),
00034       T_target_(1.0),
00035       T_kinetic_(1.0),
00036       xi_(0.0),
00037       xiDot_(0.0),
00038       tauT_(1.0),
00039       nuT_(1.0)
00040    {
00041       // Note: Within the constructor, the method parameter "simulation" hides 
00042       // the simulation() method name.
00043 
00044       // Precondition
00045       if (!simulation.energyEnsemble().isIsothermal() ) {
00046          UTIL_THROW("Simulation energy ensemble is not isothermal");
00047       }
00048    }
00049 
00050    /*
00051    * Destructor.
00052    */
00053    NvtIntegrator::~NvtIntegrator()
00054    {}
00055 
00056    /* 
00057    * Read parameter and configuration files, initialize simulation.
00058    */
00059    void NvtIntegrator::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00060    {
00061       //readBegin(in, "NvtIntegrator");
00062       read<double>(in, "dt",   dt_);
00063       read<double>(in, "tauT", tauT_);
00064       //readEnd(in);
00065 
00066       nuT_ = 1.0/tauT_;
00067       int nAtomType = simulation().nAtomType();
00068       if (!prefactors_.isAllocated()) {
00069          prefactors_.allocate(nAtomType);
00070       }
00071 
00072    }
00073 
00074    void NvtIntegrator::setup()
00075    {
00076       double dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00077       double mass;
00078       int nAtomType = prefactors_.capacity();
00079       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00080          mass = simulation().atomType(i).mass();
00081          prefactors_[i] = dtHalf/mass;
00082       }
00083 
00084       atomStorage().clearSnapshot();
00085       exchanger().exchange();
00086       atomStorage().makeSnapshot();
00087       pairPotential().findNeighbors();
00088       simulation().computeForces();
00089 
00090       // Initialize nAtom_, xiDot_, xi_
00091       simulation().computeKineticEnergy();
00092       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00093       atomStorage().computeNAtomTotal(domain().communicator());
00094       #endif
00095       if (domain().isMaster()) {
00096          T_target_ = simulation().energyEnsemble().temperature();
00097          nAtom_  = atomStorage().nAtomTotal();
00098          T_kinetic_ = simulation().kineticEnergy()*2.0/double(3*nAtom_);
00099          xiDot_ = (T_kinetic_/T_target_ -1.0)*nuT_*nuT_;
00100       }
00101       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00102       bcast(domain().communicator(), xiDot_, 0);
00103       #endif
00104       xi_ = 0.0;
00105    }
00106 
00107    /*
00108    * Integrate Nose-Hoover.
00109    *
00110    * This implements a reversible Velocity-Verlet MD NVT integrator step.
00111    *
00112    * Reference: Winkler, Kraus, and Reineker, J. Chem. Phys. 102, 9018 (1995).
00113    */
00114    void NvtIntegrator::run(int nStep)
00115    {
00116       nStep_ = nStep;
00117       if (domain().isMaster()) {
00118          Log::file() << std::endl;
00119       }
00120 
00121       setup();
00122       simulation().diagnosticManager().setup();
00123 
00124       Vector dv;
00125       Vector dr;
00126       double prefactor; // = 0.5*dt/mass
00127       double dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00128       double factor;
00129       AtomIterator atomIter;
00130       bool needExchange;
00131 
00132 
00133       // Main MD loop
00134       timer().start();
00135       exchanger().timer().start();
00136       for (iStep_ = 0; iStep_ < nStep_; ++iStep_) {
00137 
00138          if (Diagnostic::baseInterval > 0) {
00139             if (iStep_ % Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0) {
00140                simulation().diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00141             }
00142          }
00143          timer().stamp(DIAGNOSTIC);
00144    
00145          T_target_ = simulation().energyEnsemble().temperature();
00146          factor = exp(-dtHalf*(xi_ + xiDot_*dtHalf));
00147    
00148          // 1st half of velocity Verlet.
00149          atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00150          for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00151             atomIter->velocity() *= factor;
00152             prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00153             dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00154             atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00155             dr.multiply(atomIter->velocity(), dt_);
00156             atomIter->position() += dr;
00157          }
00158          timer().stamp(INTEGRATE1);
00159    
00160    
00161          // Check if exchange and reneighboring is necessary
00162          //needExchange = simulation().needExchange();
00163          needExchange = atomStorage().needExchange(domain().communicator(), 
00164                                                    pairPotential().skin());
00165          timer().stamp(Integrator::CHECK);
00166 
00167          // Exchange atoms if necessary
00168          if (needExchange) {
00169             atomStorage().clearSnapshot();
00170             exchanger().exchange();
00171             timer().stamp(EXCHANGE);
00172             atomStorage().makeSnapshot();
00173             pairPotential().findNeighbors();
00174             timer().stamp(NEIGHBOR);
00175          } else {
00176             exchanger().update();
00177             timer().stamp(UPDATE);
00178          }
00179    
00180          // Calculate new forces for all local atoms
00181          simulation().computeForces();
00182          timer().stamp(FORCE);
00183    
00184          // 2nd half of velocity Verlet
00185          atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00186          for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00187             prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00188             dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00189             atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00190             atomIter->velocity() *=factor;
00191          }
00192    
00193          // Update xiDot_ and xi_
00194          simulation().computeKineticEnergy();
00195          if (domain().isMaster()) {
00196             xi_ += xiDot_*dtHalf;
00197             T_kinetic_ = simulation().kineticEnergy()*2.0/double(3*nAtom_);
00198             xiDot_ = (T_kinetic_/T_target_  - 1.0)*nuT_*nuT_;
00199             xi_ += xiDot_*dtHalf;
00200          }
00201          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00202          bcast(domain().communicator(), xiDot_, 0);
00203          bcast(domain().communicator(), xi_, 0);
00204          #endif
00205          timer().stamp(INTEGRATE2);
00206    
00207       }
00208       exchanger().timer().stop();
00209       timer().stop();
00210 
00211    }
00212 
00213 }
00214 #endif
